MS MCQs

    Run WinAutomation processes

    »

    1. WinAutomation processes can only be run through the console.

      True

      False


    2. A process running in response to a weekly email should be run:

      Manually through the console.

      Through a weekly schedule.

      Through an email monitor trigger.

      Manually through the command line.


    3. When a process runs, information about the run can be found in:

      The console’s processes tab.

      The process designer.

      The console’s Logs tab.

      None of the above.
